trans.tran_cn: 西藏的，藏族（人）的，藏文的，藏语的
trans.tran_en: Tibetan means belonging or relating to Tibet, or to its people, language, or culture

trans.tran_cn: 西藏人，藏族人，藏文，藏语
trans.tran_en: A Tibetan is an inhabitant of Tibet or a person of Tibetan origin
